original_text: You may eat animals like that at home. It is the same as if you are eating meat from deer. Anyone may eat it. That includes people who are clean and people who are unclean.
korean_text: 네 성중에서 먹되 부정한 자나 정한 자가 다 같이 먹기를 노루와 사슴을 먹음 같이 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: You may eat animals like that at home
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 집에서 그런 동물들을 먹을 수 있다

sentences.original_text: It is the same as if you are eating meat from deer
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 사슴 고기를 먹는 것과 같다

sentences.original_text: That includes people who are clean
